settings.heading: Where does A Chau Lien ship frozen products?
settings.row_content: A Chau Lien ships frozen products nationwide across Scandinavia. At this time, we do not offer international shipping for frozen items.

settings.heading: When will my frozen order ship?
settings.row_content: Frozen orders placed by 3 PM Central European Time (CET) will ship the same day, Monday through Wednesday. Orders placed after 3 PM on Wednesday or during weekends will ship out on the following Monday to ensure freshness and prevent delays.

settings.heading: Why do my frozen and non-frozen items ship separately?
settings.row_content: To ensure your frozen items arrive in perfect condition, we use specialized packaging and handling for frozen products. These items are shipped separately from non-frozen orders because they require different storage, handling, and shipping processes.

settings.heading: Who delivers the frozen package, and how can I track it?
settings.row_content: We work with trusted delivery partners to ensure your frozen products are packaged correctly and delivered safely. You will receive a tracking number in your shipping confirmation email, which allows you to monitor the delivery of your frozen items in real time. Please note that weather conditions or unexpected delays may affect delivery times, but we always aim for timely shipments.

settings.heading: Why do I need to sign up before I can see prices or add products to my cart?
settings.row_content: In order to provide a more personalized shopping experience, we require customers to create an account and sign in before they can view product prices and add items to their cart. By signing up, you gain access to exclusive pricing, promotions, and special offers tailored to your account. It also allows us to ensure better customer service and track your orders efficiently.

settings.heading: How do I sign up for an account to see prices and start shopping?
settings.row_content: Signing up is easy! Simply click on the "Sign Up" or "Create Account" button at the top of our website. Provide your email address, create a password, and fill out the required information. Once your account is created, you will be able to log in and access product prices, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout.

settings.heading: What benefits do I get by signing up for an account?
settings.row_content: By signing up, you gain full access to product prices, the ability to add products to your cart, and a personalized shopping experience. Youâ€™ll also receive updates on new products, special offers, and exclusive deals.

settings.heading: What should I do if I have a problem with my order?
settings.row_content: If you encounter any issues with your order, such as incorrect items, damaged products, or other concerns, please contact our customer service team immediately. Provide your order number and details of the issue so we can assist you promptly.

settings.heading: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
settings.row_content: Once an order is placed and processed, we are unable to modify or cancel it. If you need to make changes, please contact us as soon as possible, and we will do our best to assist you before the order is finalized for shipping.

settings.heading: How do I know if a product is in stock?
settings.row_content: Product availability is updated in real-time on our website. If a product is out of stock, it will be indicated on the product page. You may also sign up for notifications to be alerted when the item is back in stock.

settings.heading: Who delivers the frozen package, and how can I track it?
settings.row_content: We work with trusted delivery partners to ensure your frozen products are packaged correctly and delivered safely. You will receive a tracking number in your shipping confirmation email, which allows you to monitor the delivery of your frozen items in real time. Please note that weather conditions or unexpected delays may affect delivery times, but we always aim for timely shipments.

settings.heading: What should I do if my frozen order arrives thawed or warmer than expected?
settings.row_content: We carefully pack all frozen items with appropriate cooling materials to keep them fresh during transit. It's common for frozen products to thaw slightly during delivery, but as long as they are still cool to the touch, they should be safe to consume. If you have concerns about the safety of your items or believe they are no longer safe, please contact us at info@achaulien.se within 2 days of receiving your order.

settings.heading: How long will my frozen products last in the freezer?
settings.row_content: The shelf life of frozen products varies depending on the type of item. For best quality, we suggest consuming your frozen products within 4-8 months. Always check the packaging for specific storage guidelines and expiration dates.

settings.heading: What should I do if I have more questions about my frozen order?
settings.row_content: If you have additional questions or concerns about your frozen order, please reach out to our Customer Support team at info@achaulien.se or call us at +46(0)42 206503. We are happy to assist you!
